h2_title: How to Complete the Old Man's Questline
content: Exit the temple and stick to the lava path on the left. Take out the two giants (the Sea Rakshasa) by aiming for their ankles and knocking them down. Behind the first one, you'll find green Wisps to collect. Meanwhile, for defeating the second one, you'll be rewarded with the Golden Button curio.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Furnace_Valley_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Furnace Valley Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'How to Complete the Old Man's Questline'.
The content is as follows:
Exit the temple and stick to the lava path on the left. Take out the two giants (the Sea Rakshasa) by aiming for their ankles and knocking them down. Behind the first one, you'll find green Wisps to collect. Meanwhile, for defeating the second one, you'll be rewarded with the Golden Button curio.
